name: Nourish Nosferatu
description:
A 3D interactive fiction - you play Max a 'Fleshslave' who must explore the cyberpunk slums of NarcoTown1 looking for victims for your master Nosferatu! Engage with the residents of the slums as you look for unwilling victims for the walking undead! 

Made for LudumDare43 - Theme Sacrifices must be made.

Made with Unreal Engine using original character designs made with Fuse and assets packs Cyberpunk Alley and Soul City.
